title: SFEC Form 3610b - City Officer Behested Payment - Filings
description:
San Francisco Campaign and Governmental Conduct Code section 3.610 requires City elective officers and members of certain boards and commissions to file behested payment reports (Form SFEC-3610(b)) with the Ethics Commission.

Effective September 24, 2020, Mayoral Executive Directive 20-02 requires Department Heads to file behested payment Form SFEC-3610(b) and to comply with the City’s behested payment requirements that apply to City elected officials and members of boards and commissions that are contained in Article III, Chapter 6 of the Campaign and Governmental Conduct Code. 

An officer must file Form SFEC-3610(b) any time a behested payment of $1,000 or more is made at his or her behest by an interested party. An “interested party” is a person who is a party, participant or agent of a party or participant to certain types of proceedings before the official in question. Those proceedings are limited to administrative enforcement proceedings and proceedings regarding permits, licenses, or other entitlements for use. A party to such a proceeding is someone who files an application for a license, permit, or entitlement for use or is the subject of the administrative enforcement. A participant in such a proceeding is someone who is not a party to the proceeding but who actively supports or opposes a particular decision in the proceeding and has a financial interest in the decision. An agent is someone who represents a party or a participant in such a proceeding.

The filing deadline for Form SFEC-3610(b) depends on the circumstances under which the behested payment was made.

If the behested payment was made while the proceeding involving the interested party is pending before the official, then the form must be filed within thirty days of the payment being made. If there is a series of behested payments, the form is due within 30 days of the payment that makes the total $1,000 or more.

If the behested payment was made within six months following the date on which a final decision was made in the proceeding involving the interested party, then the form must be filed within thirty days of the payment. If there is a series of behested payments, the form is due within 30 days of the payment that makes the total $1,000 or more.

Finally, if the behested payment was made in the 12 months prior to the commencement of the proceeding involving the interested party, the form is due within 30 days of the date the official knew or should have known that the source of the behested payment became an interested party.

Each row on this table represents the contents of a Form SFEC-3610(b) filed with the Ethics Commission. There are three sub-tables of information on Form SFEC-3610(b): Payors, Reportable Interests with Payee, and Communications Featuring Officer. These three subtable datasets are linked from this dataset's primer page. Join this dataset with the sub-table using the DocuSignID.

columns.name: DocuSign ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the filing, generated automatically by DocuSign.

columns.name: Filing Type
columns.description: Is the Filing Original, Amendment, or Supplemental? An Amendment supersedes the Original filing; a Supplemental is a continuation of a filing, indicating more fields were required.

columns.name: Filing
columns.description: URL to download PDF copy of the filing.

columns.name: Original Filing Date
columns.description: Only used if the Filing Type is Amendment, indicating the date of the Original Filing.

columns.name: Officer Name
columns.description: Name of City Officer.

columns.name: Agency Name
columns.description: City Officer's agency name.

columns.name: Contact Person Name
columns.description: City Officer or designated contact person (if different).

columns.name: Contact Person Telephone
columns.description: Officer or contact person phone.

columns.name: Contact Person Email
columns.description: Contact person email.

columns.name: Payee Name
columns.description: Name of payee.

columns.name: Payee Street
columns.description: Street address of payee.

columns.name: Payee City
columns.description: City of payee.

columns.name: Payee State
columns.description: State of payee.

columns.name: Payee Zip
columns.description: Zip code of payee.

columns.name: Purpose Type
columns.description: Purpose of the behested payment.  Possible options: Governmental, Legislative, or Charitable.

columns.name: Payment Description
columns.description: Describes the legislative, governmental, or charitable purpose or event for which the payment was made.

columns.name: Payors
columns.description: Payor subtable in JSON format.

columns.name: Payors SubTable Query
columns.description: URL of query to payors subtable dataset.

columns.name: Comments
columns.description: Additional comments on the form from the filer.

columns.name: DateSigned
columns.description: Date form was signed and submitted to the Ethics Commission.

columns.name: Additional Payors Required Check
columns.description: Checkbox to indicate if additional space is required to report payors.  The filer should follow up the filing with another filing with the "Filing Type" of "Supplemental".

columns.name: Reportable Interest With Payee Check
columns.description: Checkbox to indicate that the filer reported activity in the "Reportable Interest with Payee" section of the form.

columns.name: Additional Reportable Interest Payee Check
columns.description: Checkbox to indicate if additional space is required to report reportable interests with payees.  The filer should follow up the filing with another filing with the "Filing Type" of "Supplemental".

columns.name: Communications Featuring Officer Check
columns.description: Checkbox to indicate that the filer reported activity in the "Communications Featuring Officer" section of the form.

columns.name: Additional Communications Featuring Officer Check
columns.description: Checkbox to indicate if additional space is required to report communications featuring officer.  The filer should follow up the filing with another filing with the "Filing Type" of "Supplemental".

columns.name: Amendment Description
columns.description: Explanation for Amendment, provided by filer.
